review_blob: Another great beer from Kool Breweries. This new brewery, is surely making great beers. A friend told me that they have a brand new brewery that produces the beer using the German "purity law". I like the strong Bock beer more...but this Lager is also pretty good.

The Beer surely has a punch to it. I had it on my recent trip to India, and was surprised to taste the German Hops flavor in a strong Indian beer. 
Nevertheless, an excellent beer.
